channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Extreme Wildfires Have Doubled in Frequency and Intensity in the Past 20 Years
item.description: These findings align with other evidence that wildfires are getting worse—such as the total area burned each year ratcheting up.

item.title: The Best Sheets for Every Body, Bed, and Budget (2024)
item.description: Which material should you buy? Percale or linen? We tested dozens of sheets to find our favorites and break it all down.
